
# Lib
#
FILE(GLOB_RECURSE GLEW_SOURCES *.c)
FILE(GLOB_RECURSE GLEW_HEADERS *.h)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)

ADD_LIBRARY(glfglew ${GLEW_SOURCES} ${GLEW_HEADERS})

ADD_DEFINITIONS("-fPIC -DGLEW_NO_GLU")

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(glfglew Xmu Xi GL Xext X11)

# Install
#
INSTALL(TARGETS glfglew DESTINATION ${GLF_LIB_INSTALL_DIR})

INSTALL(DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/
        DESTINATION "${GLF_INCLUDE_INSTALL_DIR}" 
        FILES_MATCHING PATTERN "*.h" 
        PATTERN .svn EXCLUDE)
